title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still...

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The download button is...

title: App Crash on Launch
description: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes immediately upon opening on Android 13.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Issue
description: Customer is not receiving 2FA codes on their registered phone number.

title: Payment Failed but Charged
description: Customer reports that their payment failed but the amount was deducted from their account.

title: Email Notifications Not Received
description: Customer is not receiving order confirmation and other email notifications.

title: Incorrect Invoice Amount
description: Invoice shows incorrect billing amount for February cycle.

title: UI Bug on Dashboard
description: UI elements are overlapping on the dashboard in Safari browser.

title: Unable to Reset Password
description: Password reset link is not working; customer gets an error page.

title: Mobile App Lagging
description: Customer reports sluggish performance on older iOS devices.

title: Subscription Auto-Renewal Issue
description: Auto-renewal did not trigger and subscription expired unexpectedly.

title: App Not Compatible with iOS 17
description: Customer unable to install the app on iOS 17; app store shows unsupported message.

title: Can't Add Payment Method
description: Customer gets an error when trying to add a new credit card for payments.

title: Old Transactions Not Visible
description: Customer unable to view transactions older than 6 months in the app.

title: Live Chat Not Working
description: Customer reports that the live chat feature doesn't load on the help page.
